Situated on one of Cheltenham’s most highly desired roads, this substantial early 1900’s detached family house affords excellent accommodation and a wealth of character, set in beautiful mature gardens.

This spacious apartment is situated on the first floor of the East Wing within the highly regarded ‘The Pavilions’ development. Constructed by Messrs Trident Homes in c.1990 the property is in good condition throughout and boasts a garage.

Listed Grade II, this recently refurbished one bedroom apartment benefits from a private entrance and courtyard garden shared with only one other property. Montpellier’s amenities are just a short walk away, whilst residents parking is readily available nearby.

This spectacular two bedroom apartment occupies the entire first floor within this impressive Grade II Listed mansion house. Believed to be just the second property built in The Park and dating back to 1835, this apartment has been thoughtfully renovated and boasts off road parking and a garage.

Adjoining open fields, with distant views, this is a substantial detached period cottage, Grade II Listed, having beautifully proportioned accommodation, whilst retaining a wealth of character including a mass of exposed beams, flagstones and pretty fireplaces.

Standing at the far end of this quiet no-through road, at the foot of the Cotswold escarpment, a substantial detached bungalow, requiring some upgrading, set in a magical and well stocked garden which was largely created by the late owner and provides all year round colour.

Standing in an incredibly quiet and private location near the centre of this small rural hamlet, offering delightful walks in the adjoining countryside yet only 10 minutes drive to local shops in Bath Road. A short drive to the A417, giving speedy access to the motorway network.

A quite exceptional single storey dwelling which was substantially enlarged by the previous owner. Located in what is regarded as one of the villages most sought after roads, the property is set back from the road and boasts secure off road parking and a pretty garden with views to the hills.

Situated in Montpellier, Cheltenham’s finest residential district, this nearly new two double bedroom penthouse apartment is situated on the second floor within this landmark development recently completed by Messrs Mark Holland Group and boasts secure underground parking.

With a private patio garden, a garage and off road parking, this bright and spacious two bedroom ground floor apartment was constructed by Messrs Charles Church approximately 15 years ago and forms part of a small, select development situated within walking distance of Cheltenham town centre.

Located within this landmark and highly sought after development, this superb first floor apartment boasts three double bedrooms and three bath/shower rooms, in addition to two balconies and secure underground parking.

This Grade II Listed Regency town house is a real ‘hidden gem’, tucked away within the popular Suffolk’s district, this bright and versatile town house is beautifully proportioned and presented with its accommodation arranged over four floors.
Situated close to the village centre, yet only a short walk to open fields, this is a quintessential classic village cottage, offering excellent accommodation with a wealth of character.

This spacious penthouse apartment is situated on the top floor of the West Wing within the highly regarded ‘The Pavilions’ development. Constructed by Messrs Trident Homes in c.1990 the property is in good condition throughout and boasts spectacular views of the Cotswold escarpment and Cheltenham College.

Situated on one of Cheltenham’s most desirable roads in the heart of Montpellier, this bright and spacious apartment boasts a private front door, two bedrooms and a private courtyard to the rear. Further benefits include a walk in wardrobe to the master bedroom, a utility and permit parking.

Dating from the 1990’s, this is a purpose built apartment block created in the Regency style to compliment the original neighboring Period terrace. 58B is located on the first floor and offers beautifully proportioned accommodation and has the added benefit of requiring some updating.
